#summary This extension will add various bangla web writing layout for your forum

= Overview =

Writing Bangla is now getting easier and easier. And now, with web keyboards writing bangla is more easier. This Extension adds a keyboard bar in the bottom of webpage. 

= Supported Layouts =

  * *Bijoy*
      Traditional Bijoy layout in unicode format.
  * *Unijoy*
      Unijoy layout created by Ekeshey
  * *Probhat*
      Probhat layout created by Ekeshey

  * *Phonetic*
      Phonetic bangla layout created by Hasin Haydar

= How to install =
 # *Download the following file. <a href="http://code.google.com/p/sarimcmsextensions/wiki/bn_keyboard_punbb"> bn_keyboard.tar</a>*           
 # *Extract the file.*
 # *Upload the bn_keyboard folder to your punbb installation's /extensions/ folder.*
 # *In punbb Goto _admin_ > _extensions_ 
 # *You will find _bn_keyboard_ available in _Extensions available for install_ section
 # *Click _Install Extension_ and again in next page click _Install Extension_ again.

== Congrats!!! You have successfully installed bangla keyboard to your website ==
 
=How to use=
 # *Click the _"কিবোর্ডঃ"_ section in the keyboard bar in the bottom of the page. *
 # *Now click on your favorite bangla layout and start writing bangla*
